nodes.text: Trans-binary deflectors were a kind of technology designed to protect organic lifeforms from being killed by cosmic radiation. They were installed on space stations such as supertanker fuel depots. When the Colossus' trans-binary deflector was in danger of failing, Kazuda Xiono, Neeku Vozo, and CB-23 were sent to infiltrate the Titan to steal a working one as quickly as possible before the station's residents could be exposed to cosmic radiation.
